attributes.action: To pressent a charismatic damp rag to the President of the European Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned being very concerned to assuage the feelings of The President of the European Council wish to pay our respect to our new President.  We believe the most effective way to do this would be the presentation by the Prime Minister of a damp rag to the President.  The Rag should be one imbued of sufficent charisma so as not to offend.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
